tasks.views.task_views module¶

class tasks.views.task_views.TaskDelete(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: tasks.mixins.DeletionAllowedMixin, core.views.DeleteView

Deletes a Task

delete(request, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Deletes the Task and updates the Session. Completely overrides the default delete function (as that calls delete too late for us).
